thread.title: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech
thread.title_full: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech

title: Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech
text: > International Mother of Pistorius' girlfriend delivers daughter's speech June Steenkamp, the mother of the late Reeva Steenkamp who was shot dead by her boyfriend Oscar Pistorius in 2013, delivers a lecture on women abuse to students at Saint Dominic's school in Port Elizabeth, South Africa, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, where Reeve attended. Pistorius was released from prison into house arrest Monday Oct. 19, 2015, after serving one year out of five for the culpable homicide death of Reeva Steenkamp in Feb. 2013. (AP Photo/Michael Sheehan)
